message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase my product. Given its value and potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $11,500. I'm confident it's a worthwhile investment for you.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $9,000 is significantly below its true value. I'm willing to come down slightly to $11,000. I believe this price reflects its worth while still acknowledging your interest.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $11,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $10,250. That's the maximum I'm willing to pay for this product.
